document.full_text: fighting between col. muammar el-qaddafi's military forces and opposition fighters near the city of ajdabiya offered a backdrop to efforts by the african union, set to continue monday, to broker a cease-fire.
document.title: truce plan for libya is rejected by rebels
lines_and_colors: fighting between col. muammar el-qaddafi's military forces and opposition fighters near the city of ajdabiya offered a backdrop to efforts by the african union, set to continue monday, to broker a cease-fire.
